programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: Django Atira Primeiro, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Django sai a procura de seu pai que teve a cabeça colocada à prêmio, e chega tarde demais, pois ele fora assassinado por um caçador de recompensas.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, é convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que está desaparecido há vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua família.

programme.title: O Resgate do Bandoleiro, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seu cavalo em uma aposta, Pat Brennan pega carona em uma diligência que carregava os recém-casados Willard e Doretta Mims.

programme.title: Joe, o Pistoleiro Implacável, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: O bando do impiedoso Duncan massacra uma tribo de índios Navajo inclusive mulheres e crianças apenas para conseguir e depois vender escalpos.

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: O Último Pôr do Sol, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Belle Breckenridge e John Becheridge estão se preparando para uma jornada com o gado até o Texas, até que chega a casa deles o caubói Brendan O'Malley.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba é colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rápido do mundo e explodirá caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: A Última Exorcista, (2020, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: Depois que um estranho acontecimento faz com que todos os padres treinados em exorcismos de uma pequena cidade morram atacados, Joan Campbell deve lutar contra demônios de seu passado que, desta vez, possuíram sua irmã.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Paradise Club - O Pecado Mora Aqui, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1968, no auge da revolução sexual, Catherine é uma jovem dançarina de São Francisco que decide deixar a prestigiada boate Paradise Club para se reconectar consigo mesma.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba é colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rápido do mundo e explodirá caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Inuyasha procura por Kikyo, mas Agome a encontra primeiro. Kikyo a leva prisioneira e não escuta suas tentativas de explicar o que realmente aconteceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Voz de Kagome e o Beijo de Kikyo

programme.title: A Exterminadora de Youkais Sango é convidada para o Castelo de Hitomi junto com seu pai e seu irmão mais novo, Kohaku, deixando sua aldeia indefesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Acreditando que ele seja seu inimigo, Sango procura Inuyasha em uma busca equivocada de vingança planejada por Narak, que quer Inuyasha morto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e seus amigos param para enterrar os mortos, Sango revela a história secreta das origens da Jóia: a própria alma da sacerdotisa Midoriko.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo da Jóia das Quatro Almas é Finalmente Revelado!

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos descobrem uma aldeia que sacrifica crianças ao deus local da água e conhece um menino chamado Taromaru que precisa de sua ajuda.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Lago da Escuridão Controlado pelo Deus da Água

programme.title: Depois que o túnel de vento de Mirok é atingido em uma luta com um youkai, Mirok retorna ao templo onde ele foi criado por Mushin, mas nem tudo está bem por lá.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome e Sango falam sobre seus respectivos passados, incluindo o irmão mais novo de Sango, Kohaku. Mas Narak tem planos sinistros para com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Angústia de Sango e a Vida de Kohaku

programme.title: Sango rouba a Tessaiga enquanto Inuyasha luta contra Kohaku e vai para o castelo de Narak. Ela pretende matá-lo, mas não será assim tão fácil.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga Roubada e o Confronto no Castelo de Narak

programme.title: Sango e Kirara precisam de um antídoto para o veneno de Narak, então Inuyasha e Agome vão para uma vila onde eles encontram o gentil youkai Jinenji.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Jinenji: O Youkai Bondoso e Solitário

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos encontram uma caverna quando investigam youkais nas montanhas. Enquanto isso, Narak descobre que Kikyo ainda está viva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Inuyasha Varridos pelo Miasma

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos partem para salvar Kikyo, mas são vulneráveis a ataques de youkais. Apenas Agome está imune, graças à Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru está insatisfeito com a espada Tenseiga, e ele exige que o ferreiro Totosai lhe faça outra. Totosai chama o Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Sesshomaru continuam sua batalha, fazendo pleno uso de suas respectivas heranças. Após a luta, Sesshomaru encontra a órfão Rin.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Celebre Espada Escolhe seu Verdadeiro Mestre!

programme.title: Kuga, o líder da tribo de youkais lobos orientais, desafia Inuyasha para uma luta depois de usar os fragmentos da Jóia como acessórios.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Sequestro de Agome! Kuga, O Youkai Lobo Super Veloz!

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros estão a caminho para resgatar Agome e Shippo. Agome concorda em ajudar Kuga sob a condição de que Shippo não seja ferido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Youkai que se Apaixonou por Agome

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de outra discussão com Inuyasha. De volta à escola, ela se depara com mais problemas de relacionamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Separados, Os Dois se dão Conta de Seus Sentimentos

programme.title: Os insetos de Narak roubam um fragmento de Jóia da testa de um youkai urso. A cria de Narak, Kagura, usa um fragmento para controlar a tribo do lobo e Kuga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Plano Ardiloso! Uma Luta de Vida ou Morte!

programme.title: A batalha de Inuyasha contra Kuga continua até que a própria Kagura apareça. A cria de Narak domina os ventos na batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Armadilha de Kagura: A Mestra do Vento!

programme.title: Mirok se reúne com Koharu, uma garota que fugiu de sua aldeia depois que eles se conheceram. Então a irmã mais velha de Kagura, Kanna, usa Koharu para atacar Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Dança de Kagura e Espelho de Kanna

programme.title: Inuyasha continua lutando contra Kagura. O espelho de Kanna revela recursos inesperados quando Inuyasha usa a Ferida do Vento contra ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jóia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruição, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Coração de Onigumo Ainda Vive em Narak

programme.title: No presente, Agome sente que Inuyasha escolheu Kikyo, e decide nunca mais voltar ao passado depois de devolver os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Quero Voltar ao Lugar Onde Nós Conhecemos

programme.title: Sango encontra os corpos de seu pai e os outros exterminadores nas ruínas do castelo de Narak. Seu irmão Kohaku ainda vive, mas ele perdeu a memória.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O irmão de Sango, Kohaku, foi possuído por Narak e está tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Rosto que Não Sai do Meu Coração

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da árvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformação de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que estão escapando com suas garras, e ele não pode ouvir Agome tentando pará-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdadeira Natureza do Youkai Não Pode ser Reprimida

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua própria presa é usada para consertá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Inimigo Mortal de Meu Pai: Ryukusei

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque estão em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trás.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Onda Explosiva! O Ataque Supremo da Tessaiga

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmão, que foi à guerra, voltará. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmão lhe deu, um fragmento de Jóia. Infelizmente, é apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Flor de Pedra e o Primeiro Amor de Shippo

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A jornada mágica de Emily, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua mãe a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um especialista em artes marciais entra para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um rico homem de negócios. A empresa de segurança, propriedade de um velho amigo do combatente, esconde um plano de poder obscuro.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this riotously funny farce, Peter Sellers introduced the world to Jacques Clouseau, the clumsiest Inspector ever to trip over a case, who is out to stop the notorious Phantom (David Niven) from stealing the priceless Pink Panther diamond!

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair, (1968, Thriller)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen stars as a sophisticated but bored tycoon who pulls off a bank heist so stunning that even Boston's finest are baffled. Faye Dunaway is the sleek insurance investigator out to bring him in but who, ultimately, falls in love with him.

programme.title: Alfie, (1966, Romance)
programme.desc: Alfie is not really a bad sort. It’s just that he has this overwhelming desire for the opposite sex. You might say that “birds’ are irresistible to him, sort of second nature.

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain, (1967, Thriller)
programme.desc: A billionaire, intent on destroying Communism by starting a world war, is close to achieving his goal with the help of the world's largest, and most powerful, computer. Secret Agent Harry Palmer (Michael Caine) is the only man who can stop him!

programme.title: Another Time, Another Place, (1958, Romance)
programme.desc: Mark Trevor, a World War II newsman with the British Broadcasting Corporation who's torn between two women. One is Sara Scott, the American reporter working in England. The two embark on a romance – but it's an affair destined for tragedy.

programme.title: The Miracle Worker, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Academy Awards went to Best Actress Anne Bancroft and Best Supporting Actress Patty Duke for their moving portrayals of Annie Sullivan and her remarkable blind and deaf pupil, Helen Keller.

programme.title: Judgment At Nuremberg, (1961, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Judge Daniel Haywood (Spencer Tracy) presides over the trial of four German jurists accused of 'legalizing' Nazi atrocities. But mounting political pressure for leniency forces Haywood into making the most difficult decision of his career.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Assault on VA-33, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery (The Boondock Saints) stars as Army Veteran Jason Hill. While on a VA hospital visit, terrorists infiltrate the building and take hostages. Hill is now outnumbered and the last line of defense against the armed insurgents.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Night of the Sicario, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Natasha Henstridge (Species) stars in this action-packed thriller that will shock you at every turn. When DEA agents are ambushed by sicarios in a fatal shootout, the survivors must play a deadly game of cat and mouse to live through the night.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deep into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Urban Legend, (1998, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: When New England college student Natalie finds herself at the center of a series of sadistic murders seemingly inspired by urban legends, she resolves to find the truth about Pendleton's own legend. Rated: R

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: The Ring Two, (2005, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When evidence at a local crime scene reveals a mysterious unmarked videotape, Rachel realizes that Samara is back and more determined than ever to continue her relentless cycle of terror.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
programme.desc: Koichi is drawn back to Rohan’s house, where he sees the manga artist finishing up his next manga at an incredible speed. Rohan uses his stand Heaven’s Door on Koichi again to gain further creative inspiration from the young boy’s life experience.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!
programme.desc: Jotaro and Josuke must hunt down a rat that is believed to have become a Stand user after being shot by the bow and arrow. When the two arrive at the site, they find dozens of dead rats killed in the most bizarre fashion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon decides to go to Kukuroo Mountain to bring Killua back.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Determined to see Killua, Gon and the others say that they are Killua's friends, and ask the guard to relay that message...

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: To be able to see Killua, Gon and friends choose to go through the Testing Gate.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Thanks to Canary's help, Gon and the others get closer to the mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends meet the butler Gotoh who proposes a game to see if they are worthy enough to be friends with Killua.
programme.sub-title: Can't See x If x You're Blind

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Aunt Mito receives another letter from Gon!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua fights Zushi and senses his strange technique is similar to the one used by Illumi.
programme.sub-title: Arrival x At x The Arena

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zushi's mentor, Wing, tells Gon and Killua about the existence of something known as Nen.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: In order to break down Hisoka's Nen barrier, Gon and Killua ask Wing to let them awaken their Nen abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon's first battle in the Heaven's Arena on the 200th story is against Gido, a Nen user.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The match between Hisoka and Kastro is about to begin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kastro creates a double of himself with his mastery of Nen and steals Hisoka's arms.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Rohan Kishibe's Adventure
programme.desc: Koichi and Rohan discover a small alley that does not appear to be listed anywhere on the map. The two decide to go into the alley to see where it leads but soon find themselves walking around in circles and unable to get out.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu become friends with a Stand user named Shigekiyo Yangu, a.k.a. Shigechi, who can use his Stand to find and collect the money that is scattered across town. Impressed by the boy’s abilities.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and friends try to cash in the winning lottery ticket they found. However, the bank clerk is not convinced they’re the actual owners of the ticket, placing the three teens into a tough spot as they try to talk their way through their big lie.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Dreams of Cinderella
programme.desc: Yukako, depressed because she can’t get Koichi to return her feelings, comes across a beauty salon where the owner claims a special beauty treatment will help customers find love and happiness…

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1
programme.desc: A man named Yoshikage Kira is enjoying his lunch break at the park with a sandwich in hand. But his peaceful afternoon is cut short when Shigechi accidentally takes Kira’s sandwich bag, believing it to be his own.
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira is revealed to be the serial killer who’s been lurking in Morioh, and a Stand user as well. Having discovered his secret, Shigechi tries to fight off Kira with his Harvest, only to suffer fatal wounds from the killer’s Stand, Deadly Queen
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and Koichi come under the attack of Yoshikage Kira’s Stand bomb, called Heart Attack. Narrowly escaping the blast, Koichi tries to go after the serial killer but is stopped by Jotaro, who tells him to focus on dealing with the Stand bomb first.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 2
programme.desc: Kira is forced to appear before Koichi after his remote Heart Attack bomb is made useless by the boy’s new Stand, Reverb Act 3. Finally coming face-to-face with the serial killer, Koichi attacks him with Act 3.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua resume Nen training.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon faces Gido and Reihlvelt in a match.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Dope, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a drug dealer throws the lives of three nerdy teens in Inglewood, CA into chaos in this coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Zola, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A waitress, strikes up a friendship with a customer, who seduces her to join a weekend in Florida. What seems like a glamorous trip transforms into a journey involving a pimp, a boyfriend, gangsters and adventures in this see-it-to-believe-it tale.

programme.title: Obsession, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: An entrepreneur hires Sonny as his mechanic but soon Sonny begins an affair with his employer’s wife. The illicit couple concoct a perfect murder but how far are they willing to go to cover it?

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Six-time Academy Award® nominee Glenn Close stars in a post-apocalyptic story about a devastating disease that eradicates free will and turns its victims into flesh-eating 'hungries.'

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family—and unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Lazarus, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: A man is killed, but his death is a brief affair.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves makes his directorial debut in this explosive martial arts drama that reunites him with legendary Matrix Trilogy fight choreographer Yuen Wo Ping and stuntman Tiger Chen.

programme.title: Tekken, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: The year is 2039. The world wars have destroyed everything and territories are run by corporations, the mightiest of which is TEKKEN. In the midst of the ruined society, one warrior rises from the streets.

programme.title: Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A defenseless man is kidnapped by an organized crime syndicate and turned into a ruthless assassin.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: The King of Fighters, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: The surviving descendants of three legendary clans are transported to other dimensions to test their martial arts skills against an evil force that seeks to invade and overrun the world as we know it.

programme.title: Naked Weapon, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: 40 13 y.o. girls are kidnapped and the next 6 years forcefully trained to be sexy assassins. The survivors go on to be top int'l assassins known as China dolls. A CIA agent's on track of them.

programme.title: Clash, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Trinh, a mercenary, must complete a series of organized crime jobs for her boss in order to win the release of her kidnapped daughter.

programme.title: Operation Condor, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan ignites the big screen as the world's greatest secret agent, code name Condor. Sent to track down stolen Nazi gold, he is pursued by a ruthless band of treasure-hunting terrorists on a globe-spanning quest to reach the bounty first!

programme.title: Daddy Day Care, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau portray lifelong feuding neighbors making each day a hilarious game of revenge. But then voluptuous Ariel moves in nearby and their dormant hormones reignite in an all-out competition to win her favor.

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men, (1995, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to Grumpy Old Men, a vivacious Italian beauty attempts to convert Wabasha, Minnesota's cherished bait store into a romantic Italian restaurant.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Clerks, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary indie film that launched the career of Kevin Smith and won over audiences with its raw energy, outrageous comedy, and a hip soundtrack. CLERKS features razor-sharp wit and the debut of pop-culture icons Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: The coming-of-age of three best friends who work at a pizzeria in the seaside town of Mystic, Connecticut.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a minor-league North Carolina baseball team (the Triple A Durham Bulls) and its attentive, intelligent groupie who feels it is her mission to live with one young player per season and help him mature.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Boys And Girls, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Ryan (Freddie Prinze, Jr.) and Jennifer (Claire Forlani) couldn't be more different. As kids, they couldn't stand one another. As adults, it's their differences that bind them together in this fun RomCom from the director of SHE'S ALL THAT.

programme.title: A Guy Thing, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: Paul (Jason Lee) is a good guy. When his friends throw him a wild bachelor party, he's shocked when he wakes up in bed with a beautiful girl named Becky (Julia Stiles) and can't remember the night before. She also happens to be his fiancée's cousin.

programme.title: Pacific Heights, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young interracial couple move into their dream home and are increasingly harassed by their next-door neighbor, a tightly wound black LAPD officer. When the couple decides to fight back the feud turns deadly.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective (Worthington) teams up with a cop from New York City (Morgan) to investigate a series of unsolved murders. Based on true events.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: Flight 7500, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo is rocked by turbulence—and a terrifying force is unleashed in this spine-chilling journey into fear from the director of The Grudge.

programme.title: I.T., (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: A psychotic IT consultant (James Frecheville) utilizes his surveillance skills to terrorize a successful businessman (Pierce Brosnan) and his family.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Barry Egan (Adam Sandler) is a small business owner with seven sisters whose abuse has kept him alone and unable to fall in love. When a harmonium and a mysterious woman (Emily Watson) enter his life, his romantic journey begins.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what they’ve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco, (2015, Romance)
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Nicole Kidman captures the beauty and elegance of Grace Kelly in this true story of her transition from Hollywood starlet to Princess of Monaco.

programme.title: The Fantasticks, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A charm-drenched period-piece musical based on the Broadway smash, "The Fantasticks" tells the story of a pair of potential young lovers (Jean Louisa Kelly, Joey McIntyre) whose romance is assisted/derailed by the machinations of their fathers.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: A Man Called Horse, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars as Lord John Morgan, captured by the Sioux in early 19th century America. After Morgan embraces the tribe's way of life, he faces the intense and painful Sun Vow ritual to test his dedication and commitment.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Noah, (2014, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. "This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: The Monster Squad, (1987, Monsters)
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: Annie, (2014, Musical)
programme.desc: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Frankenstein)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Man Who Fell To Earth, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Still Smokin, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: It's Cheech and Chong at their wildest, craziest, most medicated, doing all those zonked-out characters and hilarious routines that put them where they are today: out of the country.

programme.title: Night of the Comet, (1984, Thriller)
programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive, (1986, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For most families, moving is a new beginning. But for the Creeds, it could be the beginning of the end. Because they've just moved in next door to a place that children built with broken dreams, the Pet Sematary.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby, (1968, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: The story of a young couple who are expecting their first child. Like most first-time mothers, Rosemary experiences confusion. Her husband, an ambitious but unsuccessful actor, makes a pact with the devil that promises to send his career skyward.

programme.title: The Sacrament, (2013, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Two journalists set out to document their friend's journey to reunite with his estranged sister. They track her to an undisclosed location where they are welcomed into the remote world of “Eden Parish.“

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Cooties, (2015, Zombies)
programme.desc: Teachers have the worst Monday ever when their students are turned into little killer savages in this horror comedy with unexpected laughs and unapologetic thrills.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his soul.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II, (1988, Screwball)
programme.desc: Just as the eccentric Australian is starting to adjust to life in New York City, Dundee and his beautiful girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) are targeted for death by a gang of ruthless drug dealers.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Fantasy)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends are holed up in a remote cabin, where they discover a Book Of The Dead. They unwittingly summon demons living in the nearby woods, which possess the youngsters in succession until only one is left intact to fight for survival.

programme.title: Manhunter, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: Using his uncanny ability to get inside psychopaths' minds, former FBI agent, Will Graham, returns to action to hunt down a serial killer.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: To Live And Die In L.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Federal agent Richard Chance has a score to settle, and he's through playing by the rules. He vows to take down a murderous counterfeiter by any means necessary. But as the stakes grow higher, will Chance's obsession ultimately destroy him?

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Screwball)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Leap of Faith, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Reverend Jonas Nightengale, a slick-asoil flimflam man who'll trade salvation for a donation to his touring ministry. Jonas knows how to work a crowd and a con, but his works of wonder are done with mirrors and smoke.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: The Last Airbender, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Air, Water, Earth, Fire. Four nations tied by destiny when Fire launches war against the others. Caught between the war, one Avatar discovers he's able to manipulate all four elements.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Takers, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: After pulling off a spectacular series of bank heists, the TAKERS plan a once-in-a-lifetime job with a $25 million payoff. And all that stands in their way is a cop hell-bent on doing whatever it takes to solve the case and bring them down.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Kill The Irishman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Bad Ass, (2012, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses, (2014, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) teams up with grumpy old agoraphobic Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) to kick ass and clean up the streets of L.A.

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou, (2015, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo)) and Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) return, this time to Louisiana in an attempt to find a kidnapped friend.

programme.title: How She Move, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: How She Move is an energetic and inspiring coming of age tale about a young woman step dances her heart out to achieve her dreams.

programme.title: Strictly Ballroom, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: A championship ballroom dancer finds inspiration within, and decides he'll stop at nothing to win, even if it means rewriting the rules. A worldwide feel-good hit, with an incredible soundtrack, from director Baz Luhrmann (MOULIN ROUGE!).

programme.title: 24 Hour Party People, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Graphically depicting the music and dance heritage of Manchester from the late 70s to the early 90s, the movie documents the vibrancy that made Manchester the place in the world that you would most like to be.

programme.title: The Commitments, (1991, Soundtrack)
programme.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

programme.title: Hearts Beat Loud, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Four Rooms, (1995, Screwball)
programme.desc: It is New Year's Eve at Hotel Mon Signor. Ted, the bellhop, is working his first night on the job, and the hotel's very unusual guests are about to place him in some outrageously funny predicaments. It's a wild night with a sizzling all-star cast.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Things To Do In Denver When You're Dead, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ex-gangster (Andy Garcia) reassembles his old gang for one last job. When things go awry and someone gets killed, Jimmy and his partners are marked for death, leaving Jimmy 48 hours to make things right for his buddies and the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
